languages.text: "Бойня там, за нашими спинами... Опустошительная буря — не союзники Черного сердца, а скот, благодаря которому Назракей еще жив!"
"The carnage behind us... The Reaving Tempest are not allies of the Black Heart, but cattle slaughtered to keep Nazrakhei alive!"
languages.original_text: "Бойня там, за нашими спинами... Опустошительная буря — не союзники Черного сердца, а скот, благодаря которому Назракей еще жив!"

traits.locale_text: "The slaughter behind our back... The Reaving Tempest are not an ally to the Blackheart but the cattle who had been butchered so Nazrakhei could keep his life!"
"The slaughter behind our back... The Reaving Tempest are not an ally to the Blackheart but the cattle who had been butchered so Nazrakhei could keep his life!"
"The carnage behind us... The Reaving Tempest are not allies of the Black Heart, but cattle slaughtered to keep Nazrakhei alive!"
"The carnage behind us... The Reaving Tempest are not allies of the Black Heart, but cattle slaughtered to keep Nazrakhei alive!"
"The carnage behind us... The Reaving Tempest are not allies of the Black Heart, but cattle slaughtered to keep Nazrakhei alive!"

languages.text: "Das Blutbad hinter uns ... Der plündernde Sturm sind keine Verbündeten des Schwarzen Herzens, sondern Vieh, das abgeschlachtet wird, um Nazrakhei am Leben zu halten!"
languages.original_text: "The carnage behind us... The Reaving Tempest are not allies of the Black Heart, but cattle slaughtered to keep Nazrakhei alive!"

traits.locale_text: "Das Blutbad hinter uns ... Der plündernde Sturm sind keine Verbündeten des Schwarzen Herzens, sondern Vieh, das abgeschlachtet wird, um Nazrakhei am Leben zu halten!"

languages.text: “看看我们身后这场屠杀就明白了……狂风阴谋团根本不是黑心阴谋团的盟友，而是它们的牲畜！你们被活活宰杀，好让纳札骸苟活下来！”
languages.original_text: "The carnage behind us... The Reaving Tempest are not allies of the Black Heart, but cattle slaughtered to keep Nazrakhei alive!"

traits.locale_text: “看看我们身后这场屠杀就明白了……狂风阴谋团根本不是黑心阴谋团的盟友，而是它们的牲畜！你们被活活宰杀，好让纳札骸苟活下来！”

languages.text: « Ce carnage... La Tempête ravageuse n'est pas l'alliée du Cœur Noir, mais de la chair à canon permettant de garder Nazrakhei en vie ! »
languages.original_text: "The carnage behind us... The Reaving Tempest are not allies of the Black Heart, but cattle slaughtered to keep Nazrakhei alive!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce carnage... La Tempête ravageuse n'est pas l'alliée du Cœur Noir, mais de la chair à canon permettant de garder Nazrakhei en vie ! »

languages.text: «La masacre queda atrás... ¡La Tempestad Asoladora no está aliada con el Corazón Negro, sino que son ganado sacrificado para mantener vivo a Nazrakhei!».
languages.original_text: "The carnage behind us... The Reaving Tempest are not allies of the Black Heart, but cattle slaughtered to keep Nazrakhei alive!"

traits.locale_text: «La masacre queda atrás... ¡La Tempestad Asoladora no está aliada con el Corazón Negro, sino que son ganado sacrificado para mantener vivo a Nazrakhei!».

languages.text: 「我々の背後にある殺戮…リーヴィング・テンペストは〈黒き心臓〉の仲間でなはく、ナズラクヘイを生かしておくための家畜なんだ」
languages.original_text: "The carnage behind us... The Reaving Tempest are not allies of the Black Heart, but cattle slaughtered to keep Nazrakhei alive!"

traits.locale_text: 「我々の背後にある殺戮…リーヴィング・テンペストは〈黒き心臓〉の仲間でなはく、ナズラクヘイを生かしておくための家畜なんだ」

languages.text: "Arkamızdaki katliam... Müfteris Kasırga, Kara Yürek'in müttefiki değil, Nazrakhei'i hayatta tutmak için katledilen kurbanlık bir hayvan topluluğuydu."
languages.original_text: "The carnage behind us... The Reaving Tempest are not allies of the Black Heart, but cattle slaughtered to keep Nazrakhei alive!"

traits.locale_text: "Arkamızdaki katliam... Müfteris Kasırga, Kara Yürek'in müttefiki değil, Nazrakhei'i hayatta tutmak için katledilen kurbanlık bir hayvan topluluğuydu."
